name: The Werebed
description:
This is a short horror story about The Werebed inspired by the Untold Stories video-game, as a small "horror" parody.

You come accross an abandoned manor in the middle of the night... you're extremely tired, what will you do when the Kitsune sneaks up on you?!

Find out now, in The Werebed!

Cheats here.
